entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
